name: cursify
description: Takes a local file and "cursifies" it, making it weird and distorted. Uses https://github.com/dragonfire535/xiao's util/canvas module for the distortions, this package uses that as a base and allows end users to easily use that package for a specific purpose without needing to dive into the details and intricacies of canvas and the xiao library.
author: JoRyJuky
